title: Windows 11 is now on nearly 20% of PCs, according to AdDuplex
content:
AdDuplex has released its Windows usage report for the month of February, giving us some insight into the latest numbers for Windows 11 and other versions of the OS. According to the report, Windows 11 is now on nearly 20% of Windows PCs, a small growth from the 16.1% usage share we saw in January.

The post Windows 11 is now on nearly 20% of PCs, according to AdDuplex appeared first on xda-developers.
description: AdDuplex has released its monthly Windows usage report, showing that Windows 11 and Windows 10 version 21H2 are on over 40% of PCs.
